actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-1234.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Veterans' Job Training Act of 1983 to extend the period of time during which an eligible veteran may apply for a program of job training and to postpone the date by which such a program must begin, and for other purposes.
short_title: Emergency Veterans Job Training Extension Act of 1984

summary.text: Emergency Veterans' Job Training Extension Act of 1984 - Amends the Emergency Veterans' Job Training Act of 1983 to extend from 60 to 90 days the viability of the Administrator of Veterans Affairs certificate that a veteran is eligible to participate in the job training program established by such Act. Authorizes appropriations for an additional year, through FY 1987. Extends such program from the end of FY 1984 to May 31, 1985, for applications and from December 31, 1984, to September 1, 1985, for the actual program of job training.

titles.title: Emergency Veterans Job Training Extension Act of 1984

A bill to amend the Emergency Veterans' Job Training Act of 1983 to extend the period of time during which an eligible veteran may apply for a program of job training and to postpone the date by which such a program must begin, and for other purposes.
